name: Dimensional glitch
description:
Keep the generators safe destroying the enemy bots.

Use arrow keys/wasd to move the bot.
Click to shoot.
Press E to transfer integrity to generator.

Created for Weekly Game Jam - Week 64
Theme: 'Glitch'
Thanks for playing

Music

"Mechanolith" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
